property.name: saveSpeciesQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.genome_species ( species_name, species_version) VALUES ( :SPECIES_NAME, :SPECIES_VERSION)

property.name: loadSpeciesByVersionQuery
property.value: SELECT species_name, species_version FROM catgenome.genome_species WHERE species_version = :SPECIES_VERSION

property.name: loadAllSpeciesQuery
property.value: SELECT species_name, species_version FROM catgenome.genome_species ORDER BY species_name ASC
